```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)

```

```{r car-plot}

mtcars |> 
   select(mpg, wt) |> 
   ggplot(mapping = aes(x = wt, y = mpg))+ 
   geom_point()+ 
   geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, se = FALSE)+ 
   theme_clean()+ 
   labs(title = "Title", subtitle = "Subtitle", x = "x axis", y = "y axis", caption = "mtcars")

```
